title: Customizing Your Inbox: Date Ranges
content: If you’d like to have your Gmail inbox operating more like Outlook or Yahoo (where emails are grouped by custom date ranges), look no further than the Multiple Inbox functionality. Instructions Login to your Gmail account in your web browser of choice. Select the In the Multiple inbox position option, select where you want to see these subdividers appear. (You’d like prefer to see them above your aggregated inbox, but can also select to place them below or to the right of your aggregated inbox). When finished, scroll to the bottom of the settings and click Save Changes You can use this customization for any query that supports how you like to do work--not just date ranges. Need to be able to quickly view things from certain people? Change the search query and section name accordingly. For more information on your options, check out Google’s query documentation.
